Key Match Events: Hardik Pandya scored an unbeaten 50 off 18 balls.
Kuldeep Yadav took 3 wickets for 19 runs.
Jasprit Bumrah took 2 wickets for 13 runs.
Rishabh Pant hit five boundaries in eight balls.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Bangladesh are on the brink of elimination after losing by 50 runs in Antigua.
India's total of 196 was built by a series of quickfire cameos in defiance of a slow pitch.
If Australia beat Afghanistan, both they and India will move into the final four.
Rohit Sharma and Virat Kohli's partnership has yet to click in this T20 World Cup.
Tanzim Hasan was Bangladesh's best bowler with figures of 2-32.
Rishad Hossain took two wickets and bowled one of the death overs for Bangladesh.
Bangladesh's opening partnership had provided only 13 runs in five previous innings.
Kuldeep Yadav's googly and legbreaks were pivotal in derailing the Bangladesh chase.
Jasprit Bumrah bowled 15 dot balls out of his 24 deliveries.
